title: Harda Blast! Not seen any mention on MSM
selftext:
Apparently last week there was a huge blast at a illegal Fireworks Factory in Harda, MP

Blast wave felt till few kms. The picture shows a person flung 150 feet in the air. 14 were reported dead and 200 injured. Around 40-60 homes near the factory were damaged/destroyed 

Took fire department 10 hours to douse the fire. 

How is there no mention of this?
